titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funeral of Mr. Tho. Whitchurch October the 15th. 1691. at Chalfont St. Peter's. By Henry Parsley, A.M. rector of Hodgerley, in the county of Bucks.
titleStmt.author: Parsley, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W. and J. Wilde, for G. Conyers in Little-Britain,

notesStmt.note: With initial imprimatur leaf signed: Ra. Barker.; and dated: Augusti 11 mo. 1692.
With advertisement at end of text.
Copy has stained title page; with print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
